definition: to span/to stretch across/to travel across

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span

sentences.english: This is one of many cultural chasms across the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 這只是橫跨大西洋的諸多文化鴻溝之一。

sentences.english: Two bridges spanning the glass-covered intermediate space connect the exhibition area with the southern element.
sentences.chinese: 兩座橋橫跨玻璃覆蓋的空間連接了南面的展覽面積。

sentences.english: A covered bridge traverses the stream.
sentences.chinese: 一座有頂蓋的橋橫跨這條河流。

sentences.english: The first white settlers traveled across America in wagons.
sentences.chinese: 第一批白人定居者橫跨美洲大陸時乘的是四輪馬車。

sentences.english: A pedestrian way passage links up the footbridge across Siu Sai Wan Road.
sentences.chinese: 行人通道連接橫跨小西灣道的行人天橋。

sentences.english: Why did the Emperor Hadrian build a wall right across England?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼哈德良皇帝建造了一座橫跨英格蘭的城牆？

sentences.english: The Mon and Pyu kingdoms were an active overland trade route between India and China.
sentences.chinese: 孟國和驃國是中印兩國間橫跨大陸的活躍的通商之道。

sentences.english: This is the bridge striding between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 這是座橫跨兩個國家的橋樑。

sentences.english: Russia stretches across much of the north of the supercontinent of Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯橫跨歐亞大陸北部的大部分地區。

sentences.english: Across the river lies a newly-built steel bridge.
sentences.chinese: 新建的一座鐵橋橫跨這條河流。

sentences.english: Straddling the ridge of a mountain range shaped like a dragon’s back is, appropriately enough, Dragon’s Back Trail.
sentences.chinese: 橫跨山脈的形狀像龍的背，真的像一條龍在那裏。

sentences.english: Across the borders that divide forests of stone standing petrified.
sentences.chinese: 橫跨把森林分開的站立的石頭界碑。

sentences.english: Simply supported reinforced concrete bridges spanning the spillways all came off their bearings.
sentences.chinese: 由泄水壩支撐的橫跨水泥公路完全脫離了它的承載體。

sentences.english: Up ahead appeared something like a sluice gate, straddling the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 前方出現了一個大水閘似的建築，攔腰橫跨在鐵道上。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Dragons Lair, An animated mythical dragon flys across your screen.
sentences.chinese: 活生生神話的龍橫跨你的屏幕飛行。
